plot: Children, between their need for protection and autonomy, must sometimes suffer the whims of adults and must defend themselves and become tough.
title: La tienda de abrazos
plot_es: Children, between their need for protection and autonomy, must sometimes suffer the whims of adults and must defend themselves and become tough.
plot_en: Children, between their need for protection and autonomy, must sometimes suffer the whims of adults and must defend themselves and become tough.
